RPGGrid.input
Class SoundPlayer

java.lang.Object
  RPGGrid.input.SoundPlayer

public class SoundPlayer
extends java.lang.Object

A SoundPlayer manages the sound for a RPGWorld.

Author:
Sean MacLane with the help of Oracle

Stops all sounds currently playing. Sets f equal to null to avoid out of memeory errors.
